original_title: 白夜の誓い ―グスタフIII世、誇り高き王の戦い―
overview: In the midst of Sweden's rise to power, King Gustav III was the "darling of the rococo" who brought to flower the gorgeous Nordic culture. Set in the turbulent 18th century Europe, where power and intrigue swirled around him, this musical depicts his love, friendship, and courageous battle for his beliefs on a grand scale, involving a variety of characters.
title: Oath of the Midnight Sun - Gustav III: A Battle by a Proud King
